entry.title: Saturday: A few flurries. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. A few flurries beginning this morning and ending this afternoon. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 near noon. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 30 this morning and minus 11 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature rising to plus 1 by morning. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries this evening and after midnight. Wind southwest 20 km/h. Temperature rising to plus 1 by morning. Wind chill minus 11 this evening. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Saturday 04 February 2023
